author: /cronologia/-/meta/agencia-efe
title: ¡Alerta! Huracán Helene se fortalece casi a categoría 3 en su ruta a Florida
text: [Fenómenos climáticos](/cronologia/-/meta/fenomenos-climaticos) El[ huracán Helene ](https://www.laprensa.hn/mundo/helene-dirige-florida-podria-sufrir-inundaciones-mortales-GM21783731)se fortaleció durante la mañana de este jueves hasta casi alcanzar la categoría 3 en la escala Saffir-Simpson y mientras prosigue su avance hacia Florida, informó el Centro Nacional de Huracanes (NHC, en inglés) de Estados Unidos. Según el boletín de la 1 de la tarde, hora del centro de Estados Unidos (18:00 GMT) del NHC, Helene presenta vientos máximos sostenidos de 175 kilómetros por hora (110 millas) y es casi un huracán de categoría 3, que es partir de 178 kilómetros por hora (111 millas). El sistema se encuentra a 315 kilómetros (195 millas) al suroeste de Tampa, en la costa centro-oeste de Florida, y a 365 kilómetros (230 millas) al sur de Apalachicola, en el extremo noroeste de este estado y localidad ésta última donde el nivel del mar puede aumentar hasta 4,5 metros (15 pies) por la marejada ciclónica. Helene, el octavo sistema con nombre en la actual temporada de huracanes en el Atlántico, amenaza con fuertes vientos, marejada ciclónica e inundaciones a una amplia franja costera floridana de cara al Golfo de México. El sistema se desplaza con rapidez a 26 kilómetros por hora (16 millas) con dirección nor-noreste y los meteorólogos del NHC prevén que esta noche toque tierra en el noroeste de Florida, en la región conocida como Big Bend, como un huracán mayor, es decir de categoría 3, 4 o 5. “Se espera un debilitamiento después de tocar tierra, pero la rápida velocidad de avance de Helene permitirá que sus vientos fuertes y dañinos, especialmente en ráfagas, penetre bien tierra adentro a través del sureste de Estados Unidos”, alertó el NHC. De impactar en Florida, como se prevé, será el cuarto huracán que alcance tierras estadounidenses este año, tras Beryl, Debby y Francine. Se forma la tormenta tropical Isaac Mientras, otra tormenta tropical se formó sobre el Atlántico norte, Isaac, y se encuentra hoy a 2.170 kilómetros (1.345 millas) al oeste de las Azores y a 1.315 kilómetros (820 millas) al este-noreste de las Bermudas. El sistema avanza hacia el este, lo que le aleja del Caribe y la costa estadounidense, y presenta vientos máximos sostenidos de 85 kilómetros por hora (50 millas por hora). Se pronostica que Isaac se convierta o esté cerca de convertirse en huracán en la noche del viernes o madrugada del sábado. Según la Administración Nacional de Océanos y Atmósfera de Estados Unidos (NOAA), la temporada de huracanes en el Atlántico, que comenzó oficialmente el 1 de junio, podría tener una actividad “por encima” del promedio, con entre 8 y 13 huracanes, de los cuales entre 4 y 7 serían de categoría mayor.

author: Yeni Şafak
title: Spanish defense minister welcomes Turkish earthquake survivor family | Europe
text:
Spanish Defense Minister Margarita Robles on Friday warmly welcomed a Turkish family in Madrid, who had been rescued from the rubble in the Nurdagi district of southeastern Gaziantep province by the Spanish Emergency Military Unit (UME) following the devastating earthquakes that hit southern Türkiye on Feb. 6, 2023.
At the ministry, Robles hosted Elif, her brother Mahsun Salih, and their mother Leyla Yilmaz, who were rescued from the rubble of Ismet Coskun Apartment by UME in the earthquake zone.
She expressed her heartfelt sentiments, saying: "We are very happy to see you here. Spain is now your home, and you are part of our family."
Robles praised the courage, strength, and resilience of the earthquake survivor mother and pledged ongoing support for the children's education.
"We were excited when the children were rescued from the rubble, and today we are thrilled and excited to see them healthy and safe here in Spain," she said, extending her gratitude to the UME personnel who risked their lives to save others.
Leyla Yilmaz, the mother of the rescued children, conveyed her deep appreciation, stating: "The Spanish people have always been a brotherly people to us, but this solidarity has increased even more after the earthquake. The Spanish soldiers who rescued my children are our guardian angels."
The UME soldiers who participated in the rescue operations in Nurdagı reflected on the experience, calling the rescue "truly a miracle."
They emphasized the collaborative nature of the effort, which involved many dedicated individuals. "We are now happy to see the children growing up and to get to know the family more deeply. We hope to see them here again in the coming years. If not, we will visit them in Nurdagi once more," they added.
In the earthquakes centered in Kahramanmaraş on Feb. 6, 2023, 31-year-old Leyla Yilmaz, her 6-year-old daughter Elif, and her 2-year-old son Mahsun Salih were rescued alive 106 hours after the collapse of Ismet Coskun Apartment in the Yavuz Selim neighborhood of Nurdagi district, Gaziantep.
# Gaziantep # Margarita Robles # Spain

author: Grant Polachek
title: Top Tech Resolutions for 2024 Unveiled
text:
As we usher in the year 2024, many individuals aim to
maximize their utilization of technology products to enhance productivity and efficiency in their daily lives. This article will explore the top five tech-related objectives this year to capitalize on these technological advances. First, embracing the integration of artificial intelligence and automation tools can significantly streamline workflow and minimize mundane tasks, allowing more time to focus on critical aspects of work or personal life. Second, investing in cybersecurity measures and practicing good digital hygiene will prevent the costly loss of time and resources associated with compromised data and privacy breaches.
Effective email management for increased productivity
Firstly, managing your email effectively is crucial. Maintaining a clutter-free inbox can be daunting, but adopting an email workflow strategy that merges the benefits of multiple services, such as Gmail and Hey, may be helpful. Don’t shy away from employing third-party tools to manage your inbox better. Incorporating these tools helps you prioritize important messages, filter out spam, and keep track of personal and work correspondence. Establishing an organized
email management system can save time, minimize stress, and boost your overall productivity.
Embracing AI to augment daily tasks and improve efficiency
Secondly, consider embracing AI in your everyday routines. Although AI tools like ChatGPT have their shortcomings, they can still augment various aspects of your workload. In 2024, consider investigating more AI-integrated products and leveraging their abilities, like automatically generating descriptions and transcribing audio. By incorporating AI into your daily tasks, there is potential to streamline your workflow and improve overall efficiency. Remember that while AI is not a replacement for human input, it can assist in alleviating repetitive and mundane tasks, allowing you to focus on higher-level strategic thinking and creativity.
Decluttering online storage for a more organized digital life
Thirdly, make a commitment to declutter your online storage. Retaining unnecessary files in your digital repositories can make it difficult to find crucial items when needed. This year, allocate some time to tidy up your Google Drive, Dropbox, iCloud, and Apple Photos collections. By doing so, you will create a more organized digital space and enhance your overall productivity as you save valuable time that would otherwise be spent searching for important documents. Furthermore, it is wise to regularly clean up and organize your online storage to maintain a clutter-free environment and simplify your digital life.
Reading e-books for personal growth and knowledge expansion
Fourthly, resolve to read more e-books, whether on a dedicated e-reader or an iPad. E-books offer an invaluable way to occupy time that might have been spent mindlessly scrolling through
social media feeds. Engaging with e-books can result in a more enjoyable and fruitful use of your downtime. Additionally, e-books often provide added features like adjustable font sizes and built-in dictionaries, enhancing the reading experience and making it more accessible for all. Plus, with the availability of countless e-books across different genres, there’s always something new and exciting to discover, encouraging personal growth and expanding your knowledge.
Diversifying digital presence for a fulfilling online experience
Lastly, in continuously pursuing a well-rounded digital life, it’s vital to look beyond Twitter. While the platform offers rich content and connections, it’s equally important to minimize time spent on social media and explore alternative platforms for a more gratifying online experience. Diversifying your digital presence can not only help in discovering new sources of information but also reduce the risk of solely relying on a single platform. Engaging in different platforms, including podcasts, news websites, or forums, can expand your perspective, enhance your creative input, and lead to a more fulfilling virtual life.
Conclusion and embracing tech resolutions for a successful year
In summary, embracing these New Year’s tech resolutions will enable you to tap into the full potential of technology to boost overall productivity and efficiency. With these objectives in mind, we wish you a thriving and triumphant 2024. Continuing to adapt and evolve with the ever-changing world of technology will ensure that you stay ahead of the curve and maximize its benefits. So go on, make the most of these resolutions, and empower yourself for an even more successful and technologically advanced year ahead.
FAQs: Top Tech Resolutions for 2024
1. How can I effectively manage my email for increased productivity?
To manage your email effectively, consider adopting an email workflow strategy that combines the benefits of various services, such as Gmail and Hey. Don’t hesitate to use third-party tools to prioritize important messages, filter out spam, and keep track of personal and work correspondence. Establishing an organized email management system saves time, reduces stress, and improves overall productivity.
2. How can AI aid my daily tasks and enhance efficiency?
AI tools like ChatGPT can augment various aspects of your workload. Investigate AI-integrated products and use their abilities to generate descriptions and transcribe audio automatically. While AI is not a replacement for human input, incorporating it into your daily tasks can streamline workflow, alleviate repetitive tasks, and free up time for higher-level strategic thinking and creativity.
3. What is the importance of decluttering my online storage?
Decluttering online storage creates a more organized digital space and enhances overall productivity by making it easier to find important items when needed. Regularly clean up and organize your cloud storage services like Google Drive, Dropbox, iCloud, and Apple Photos to maintain a clutter-free environment and simplify your digital life.
4. Why should I read more e-books for personal growth and knowledge expansion?
Reading e-books can be a more enjoyable and fruitful use of your downtime compared to scrolling through social media feeds. E-books often offer additional features like adjustable font sizes and built-in dictionaries, making the reading experience more accessible. With countless e-books available across different genres, engage with them to encourage personal growth, expand your knowledge, and better use your leisure time.
5. How can diversifying my digital presence lead to a fulfilling online experience?
Diversifying your digital presence helps in discovering newer sources of information and reduces the risk of relying solely on one platform, like Twitter. Engaging with different platforms, including podcasts, news websites, or forums, can expand your perspective, enhance your creative input, and lead to a more enjoyable and well-rounded virtual life.

author: @infobae
title: Un doblete de Miedema ante Chelsea permite al City dar un paso firme hacia las semifinales - Infobae
text:
Redacción deportes, 19 mar (EFE).- Un doblete de la neerlandesa Vivianne Miedema ante el Chelsea permitió al Manchester City lograr un sólido triunfo (2-0) en la ida de cuartos de final de la Liga de Campeones femenina, resultado que le permite acudir a Stamford Bridge con comodidad y dar un paso firme hacia semifinales.
La colombiana Mayra Ramírez anotó para el conjunto londinense en el minuto 71, lo que hubiera sido una gran inyección para el Chelsea, pues suponía en ese momento el empate; pero fue anulado, por lo que deberá intentar la remontada en la vuelta.
Tras caer derrotadas el 15 de marzo en Londres en la Super League, las 'ciudadanas' pusieron en marcha su plan de revancha.
Miedema fue clave en un partido en el que buscaron las oportunidades en todo momento. En el minuto 61, con la izquierda, la dorsal '6' aprovechó un saque de esquina para, finalmente, determinar la tan esperada ventaja en el electrónico (1-0).
Enchufada, firmó el doblete a sólo dos minutos del final para permitir que su equipo respirara de alivio ante la ardua tarea a la que se enfrenta: imponerse a las líderes nacionales.
Y es que el City, capitaneado por la española Laia Aleixandri y con el apoyo defensivo de Leila Ouahabi, lo tuvo casi todo desde el principio: persistencia, ataque y solidez.
El Chelsea está ahora obligado a remontar en casa el jueves 27 para seguir aspirando al título. EFE

author: Jaurdyn Johnson
title: 'The most difficult year': Ski resorts across WNY struggle with mild winter
text: ELLICOTTVILLE, NY — In Ellicottville, Holiday Valley Ski Resort closed on Thursday to make snow for their weekend festivities as the mild winter has been difficult for most ski resorts in WNY. The Cattaraugus Co. ski resort had to cancel its pond skimming event on Saturday and will have a [concert](https://www.holidayvalley.com/activities-events/?p=1&page=event&id=13&v=list) instead. "I believe that this is the latest we've ever made snow before," said Dash Hegeman, Holiday Valley Director of Marketing. The resort brings tons of skiers to Ellicottville and businesses need customers to thrive, like The Boardroom Snowboard Shop at the base of Holiday Valley. "This was probably the most difficult year I can remember," said owner Spencer Timkey. "Other years you may take that for granted just in the power of snowmaking but in a year like this when it kind of saves your hide, you appreciate those guys that much more." Other shop owners like Trey Clauss of the City Garage Ski Shop agree. "We just deal with what Mother Nature gives us," said Clauss. "When you get here it may be a mediocre day but it's better than being at work." The Ellicottville Chamber of Commerce, Executive Director Brian McFadden says this winter has brought enough people in to consider it a win. "Ellicottville is a four-season destination, truly a four-season destination. When you look around the region, some people have ski resorts. People have great summer programs, but there aren't many resorts that have winter and a summer programs. We have both. We have the best of both." said McFadden. The teams at the top of Holiday Valley will continue snowmaking until Friday morning. "This is a really good indication that we're out there committed to our guests and doing everything that we can to give them as awesome and as long of a season as possible," said Hegeman.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Gresham Fire facilities get radon ‘green light’ following testing, mitigation
text: Both Gresham Fire & Emergency Services buildings that got the radon red flag have been deemed, and tested, safe thanks to mitigation systems put in place by the city of Gresham. Station 75 and the Gresham Fire Training Center are back open after the placement of radon systems and rigorous secondary testing. Through those processes, all level readings were found well within safety guidelines. “We want to take care of our firefighters, their health and wellbeing is important to us,” said Gresham Fire Chief Scott Lewis. The new plan moving forward is to test all fire buildings for radon every two years. Station 75 and the training facility also now have radon monitors that report real-time numbers. It was a quick turnaround in both cases. Station 75, in Troutdale, was found to have dangerous numbers Thursday, Jan. 25 — it is unknown how long the radon levels were increased. The firefighters stationed there were moved to nearby Station 74. By Friday mitigation was installed, and by that Monday the tests were found to be clear. That timeframe held true at the training facility, which was part of a sweeping test of all fire stations. The city is now testing for radon at other buildings, including operations and city hall. “Years ago we had a radon expert that worked with the city and the common knowledge then was any building with a basement is more susceptible,” said Assistant City Manager Steve Fancher. “But Station 75 is on a slab, and had elevated radon, so we are testing everything.” Also at the behest of firefighters, the city tested all eight buildings’ drinking water. None were found to have elevated levels of lead or copper. This is not the first time the city has tested for radon. In 2019 a contractor inspected every Gresham fire station. Station 74, which has a basement, got a mitigation system put in place. But that expert did not find concerning numbers in any other building. “You don’t know what you don’t know,” Chief Lewis said. “Not one (Occupational Safety and Health Administration) inspection has flagged radon.” Radon is a naturally occurring gas that moves through the ground and gets into buildings through cracks in the floors, walls and foundations. It often accumulates in places were the ventilation is inadequate, and long-term exposure can lead to lung disease and other health complications. The elevated radon levels had nothing to do with firefighting or the equipment within those buildings. There is some speculation it could have to do with the geography and porous sediment and rocks that may allow radon to more easily move about the ground — those two buildings that had elevated numbers were in the northern parts of the city. “Radon is a potential risk in the whole Portland metro area,” Fancher said. All of that means other residences/businesses in the area could also have high levels of radon. Because it is odorless and colorless, the only way to know is through a testing kit. Learn more, and find a kit, online at epa.gov/radon. Gresham City Council voted in late January to approve the use of $1.3 million in American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA) dollars to make improvements to fire stations. That work is ongoing and should be largely completed by the end of spring. “Council came up with tangible, action-oriented ideas that will first and foremost take care of our firefighters,” said Interim City Manager Erik Schmidt. There are mechanical upgrades being done like better HVAC ventilation; better seals/latches on doors to ensure the positive/negative pressure holds between the apparatus and living quarters; and an industrial hygienist who has been contracted to audit every station to flag any other potential risks.

author: @fweber
title: Botafogo bate recorde de investimento estratégico. Entenda mais!
text:
Botafogo
Futebol Cifras milionárias: Botafogo reforça o elenco para a nova temporada; Números impressionam Os números impressionam e a torcida também celebrou as novas aquisições nas redes sociais
Por Fernanda Weber
Atualizada em 05/09/2024 - 18:37hs BRT
Por Fernanda Weber
Atualizada em 05/09/2024 - 18:37hs BRT
Últimas do Botafogo O Botafogo viveu um ano histórico em termos de investimentos para a montagem de seu elenco. Após encerrar a segunda janela de transferências de 2024, o clube alcançou a expressiva marca de R$ 373,2 milhões aplicados em novas contratações, superando os valores gastos desde que se tornou SAF, em 2022.
© Foto: Vítor Silva/ BFR ; Botafogo John Textor, presidente da SAF do Botafogo, em evento de apresentação dos novos reforços contratados pelo clube para temporada Palmeiras empata com o Cruzeiro em 1 a 1 e é campeão brasileiro Em despedida de Fábio Santos, Inter bate Corinthians por 2 a 1 O objetivo claro é equilibrar-se no nível de competitividade com gigantes como Palmeiras e Flamengo, dando ao elenco da Estrela Solitária a força necessária para disputar os principais títulos. Com 20 novos jogadores adicionados ao elenco em 2024, o Fogão mostrou a sua força no mercado.
Entre as grandes aquisições estão Luiz Henrique, do Real Betis, e Thiago Almada, ex-Atlanta United, que juntos somaram R$ 222,9 milhões . Esses reforços representam mais da metade do valor total investido pelo clube na temporada, elevando a qualidade técnica e a variedade tática para Artur Jorge.
Allan, Almada e Igor Jesus jogadores do Botafogo apresentados a torcida antes da partida contra o Atletico-MG no Engenhão pelo campeonato Brasileiro A 2024. Foto: Thiago Ribeiro/AGIF
Planejamento de longo prazo
O Glorioso mostrou uma clara estratégia ao explorar cinco diferentes mercados ao redor do mundo. Jogadores foram recrutados do Brasil, América do Sul, Estados Unidos, Europa e Ásia, trazendo diversidade ao elenco. A filosofia “Botafogo Way” tem guiado essas movimentações, buscando atletas que se encaixem no estilo de jogo proposto e na cultura do clube.
Além das contratações milionárias, o clube também demonstrou inteligência ao buscar oportunidades de mercado, como a chegada de Alex Telles , que assinou na reta final da janela. A gestão financeira do clube, liderada por John Textor, trabalha com pagamentos parcelados e planeja o fluxo de receitas futuras, evitando impactos imediatos nos cofres do clube.
Você está ansioso para ver como o elenco reformulado do Botafogo vai se sair em campo? Você está ansioso para ver como o elenco reformulado do Botafogo vai se sair em campo?
0 PESSOAS JÁ VOTARAM
O Botafogo contratou 18 jogadores por R$ 150,8 milhões, formando um elenco mais competitivo, com oito desses reforços já como titulares. O planejamento inclui a possibilidade de transferências dentro da rede de clubes de John Textor, como para o Lyon, garantindo flexibilidade financeira.
Torcida confiante A expectativa da torcida alvinegra está nas alturas, especialmente em relação aos novos reforços. Entre os jogadores mais caros, Thiago Almada desponta como a grande estrela, contratado por R$ 138 milhões nesta temporada. Luiz Henrique, Matheus Martins e Vitinho também figuram entre os atletas de maior investimento.
Veja também
Adryelson no Botafogo: titular ou opção em seu retorno ao Glorioso
Os torcedores estão empolgados e apoiam os novos reforços com entusiasmo. As redes sociais foram inundadas com comentários, expressando a crença de que o Glorioso está voltando aos “dias de glória”. Entre as milhares de mensagens, destacam-se frases como “É o Glorioso!” e “Se eu estiver sonhando, não me acorde, por favor” .
O clube, agora, tem a responsabilidade de corresponder às expectativas dentro de campo, com a certeza de que o investimento realizado será a chave para um futuro vitorioso. A reconstrução está completa, e o foco se volta para conquistar o sucesso esportivo.
Opinião dos Gloriosos
Fernanda Weber
Fernanda Weber é uma jornalista com cerca de dois anos de experiência na cobertura de esportes, com ênfase no futebol brasileiro e sul-americano. Graduada em Jornalismo pela FSG Centro Universitário da Serra Gaúcha em 2022, atualmente cursa a pós-graduação em MBA em Jornalismo Digital. Atua no Bolavip Brasil, mas já passou por outros veículos de comunicação, como Adesso TV, (Webrádio) Dimensão Esportiva e (Canal) Stadio Vox.

author: Redacción de La Nueva.
title: En Saavedra, los Reyes Magos hicieron sonreir a todos los chicos
text: En Saavedra, los Reyes Magos hicieron sonreir a todos los chicos Con la Ermita Nuestra Señora de Luján de la Sierra como escenario natural, se llevó a cabo una nueva edición de la tradicional llegada de los soberanos de Oriente. Cientos de personas disfrutaron de la fiesta de Reyes Magos en Saavedra, organizada por los Misioneros de la Ermita "Nuestra Señora de Luján de la Sierra", evento del que participaron personas de toda la región. En la Ermita se vivió una noche ideal desde el punto de vista climático. Allí se llevó a cabo el espectáculo, en el que se narró desde el momento del anuncio de arcángel Gabriel a la Virgen María, hasta la llegada de los Reyes Magos, que en esta oportunidad descendieron a caballo cargados con juguetes para los pequeños que estaban en el predio. Este año el papel de Jesús fue interpretado casi por uno de los bebés de más corta edad desde que se realiza el evento, desde 1.996: se trata de Rafael Seligmann Zubillaga, de un mes y unos días de vida. Así, en una noche llena de colores por el vestuario que tenían los actores, se fue siguiendo las palabras del relato a cargo de Ariel Cutini, Domingo Rodríguez, Juan Justo Oregui, Lorena Biscaichipy, Telma Cassano y María Susana Venanzi. Cada secuencia previa a la bajada de los Reyes Magos estuvo acompañada por un coro que conformaron Luján González, Estefania Fernández, Jazmín Cepeda, Rubén Dailoff y Ariel Cutini. En la Emita, en el altar de piedra, se emplazó un pesebre donde María mantuvo en su regazo casi todo el relato al pequeño niño acompañado por José, los ángeles y los pastores. Finalizado el evento, Constanza Filócomo, una de las organizadoras, resaltó que el evento fue “hermoso, el clima nos acompañó perfectamente, incluso los días previos al ensayo que lo tuvimos que suspender reiteradamente porque había alerta meteorológico”. “Salió todo maravilloso. Estamos más que agradecidos por el esfuerzo de todos, lo mismo que a la comisión de la Ermita, que está constantemente al pie del cañón para cualquier cosa que necesitemos, además de los bomberos y el centro criollo Las Sierras”, dijo. Además, destacó la muy buena concurrencia de público. “Hubo mucha gente de afuera. Fue una noche espectacular la que nos tocó”, destacó. (Agencia Saavedra)

author: redacao@zerozero.pt (Renato Soares)
title: Hecatombe europeia
text:
O Sporting viajou até Madrid com o objetivo de carimbar a passagem à fase de grupos da Liga dos Campeões. Depois da desastrosa eliminação do Benfica às mãos do Hammarby, cabia às comandadas por Mariana Cabral a difícil missão de fazer uma remontada perante o Real Madrid e colocar uma equipa portuguesa no topo do futebol europeu.
As verde e brancas entraram cheias de garra e personalidade, chegaram ao golo aos cinco minutos e... não mais se encontraram. Depois da derrota por 1-2 no Estádio Aurélio Pereira, as leoas voltaram a sair derrotadas do confronto com as espanholas de José Alberto Toril por 1-3.
Uma Leoa... fugaz
O Sporting não podia ter pedido entrada melhor no Estádio Alfredo Di Stéfano. As leoas entraram cheias de personalidade e sem medo das adversárias. Pressionantes e intensas, assim se pode resumir a personalidade das verde e brancas nos minutos iniciais.
Livre descaído sobre a meia direita do ataque do Sporting aos cinco minutos de jogo. Andreia Bravo chamada à cobrança. Livre executado de forma exímia, a encontrar Ana Capeta completamente sozinha no segundo poste. Estava aberto o marcador.
Dois minutos. Foi o tempo que durou a vantagem sportinguista. Feller disparou nas costas da defensiva leonina, encontrou Weir no centro da área e a escocesa só teve de amortecer para a chegada de Toletti. Grande remate da francesa, já na grande área leonina, para a igualdade no marcador.
As comandadas por Mariana Cabral ficaram bastante atordoadas depois do golo sofrido e mostraram muitas dificuldades até ao final da primeira metade. As merengues de Alberto Toril, orientadas pela magia de Caroline Weir e pela endiabrada Naomie Feller foram sempre «demasiado» para a defensiva portuguesa.
Merengues satisfeitas perante uma leoa adormecida
Os segundos 45 minutos não trouxeram o desejado: mudança do rumo da partida. As espanholas começaram como haviam acabado e rapidamente chegaram ao golo que confirmaria a remontada. A média francesa, Sandie Toletti, fez o segundo da conta pessoal, mas o destaque vai mesmo para o passe monumental de Caroline Weir que desmontou toda a defensiva leonina.
O Sporting ia acusando o desgaste físico e Mariana Cabral tentou alterar alguma peças. Telma Encarnação entrou para o lugar de Brittany Raphino e Brenda para o lugar de Andreia Bravo. Sem sucesso.
Toletti e companhia iam gerindo os tempos e momentos de jogo. As leoas iam sendo embaladas à medida que a chegada à fase de grupos da Liga dos Campeões se ia tornando numa mera miragem.
Maiara ainda assustou à passagem do minuto 75, através de um livre direto, mas Misa Rodríguez disse presente e defendeu o esférico para canto. Quando já todos estavam conformados com o resultado, eis que Alba Redondo decidiu mostrar o porquê de ter sido contratada ao Levante. Condução da esquerda para dentro e remate indefensável ao ângulo superior esquerdo da baliza de Hannah Seabert.
Ponto final nas aspirações portuguesas no topo do futebol europeu. Uma verdadeira hecatombe.

author: Owen Jenkins
title: Innovative Solutions: Amygdala Neurosciences and ANS-858 in Addiction Treatment
text:
Innovative Solutions: Amygdala Neurosciences and ANS-858 in Addiction Treatment
Owen JenkinsUpdated: 04-02-2025 05:54 PM
Amygdala Neurosciences Introduces ANS-858 for Addiction Therapy
The advancement of ANS-858, a novel and selective inhibitor of aldehyde dehydrogenase 2 (ALDH2), marks a significant milestone in the quest for effective therapies for substance use disorders (SUD). This innovative drug, designed to be orally bioavailable, seeks to provide a transformative solution for individuals grappling with addiction and compulsive eating. The promising discovery and preclinical efficacy of ANS-858 will be presented at an upcoming scientific meeting.
Understanding ANS-858
ANS-858 is a proprietary small molecule specifically targeting ALDH2, an enzyme involved in the metabolic processes related to alcohol and other substance dependencies. By inhibiting ALDH2, ANS-858 intends to diminish the rewarding effects of substances, thus potentially reducing the risk of relapse. It aims to offer a dual benefit: curbing cravings and alleviating anxiety, which often accompanies substance use disorders.
Significant Preclinical Results
The decision to move forward with ANS-858 as the leading candidate for clinical trials was based on extensive preclinical data showcasing its efficacy, selectivity, and safety profile. This mechanism represents a fresh approach to combating addiction by impacting the dopamine reward pathways in the mesolimbic system. In stark contrast to traditional therapeutic options, ANS-858 promises enhanced tolerability, dosing flexibility, and optimized pharmacokinetics.
Commitment to Addiction Treatment
Brent K Blackburn, PhD, the CEO of Amygdala Neurosciences, emphasized the urgent need for improved addiction treatments, stating, "We are dedicated to enhancing the landscape of treatment for substance use disorder, which represents a significant medical need. The development of ANS-858 is vital for providing effective therapies aimed at reducing drug consumption and nurturing recovery pathways for affected individuals." The team is preparing to commence first-in-human clinical trials to further evaluate ANS-858's efficacy in reducing drug consumption.
The Urgency of Addressing Substance Use Disorders
Statistics highlight a severe public health crisis, with around 48 million American adults diagnosed with substance use disorders. Alcohol use disorder alone affects more than 28 million Americans. Unfortunately, the available treatment options are often inadequate. For instance, there are 1.2 million individuals struggling with cocaine use disorder, yet no medical interventions exist. ANS-858 is engineered to provide a precise, pharmacological approach that modulates dopamine biosynthesis in the brain without disturbing its baseline levels.
Next Steps for ANS-858
Amygdala Neurosciences is taking proactive steps by planning to submit an Investigational New Drug (IND) application to the FDA to initiate Phase 1 clinical trials for ANS-858, aiming to bring this innovative therapy one step closer to patients in need.
Amygdala at Upcoming Scientific Meetings
The Research Society on Alcohol (RSA) will be hosting its Annual Scientific Meeting, uniting researchers from diverse backgrounds to discuss the latest advancements about alcohol research. This event encourages professional networking and collaborative exchanges within a friendly environment. The meeting will occur in a well-attended city known for its vibrant culture.
About ANS-858 and Its Mechanism
ANS-858 works uniquely at the neural junctions linking motivation and action in the brain, diminishing the dopamine surges that lead to cravings. Preclinical studies have indicated that inhibition of ALDH2 effectively curtails drug-seeking behavior against various addictive substances, showing its promise as a future pharmacotherapy not only for substance use disorders but also for managing binge eating and anxiety issues.
About Amygdala Neurosciences, Inc.
Amygdala Neurosciences is passionate about developing solutions for those dealing with the burdens of addiction and harmful cravings related to various substances, including food. The foundation of the company stems from pioneering technology cultivated by leaders within the organization during their tenure at earlier firms and strategically acquired insights that drive their innovations today.
Frequently Asked Questions
What is ANS-858?
ANS-858 is a proprietary and selective ALDH2 inhibitor developed by Amygdala Neurosciences aimed at treating substance use disorders.
How does ANS-858 work?
This drug inhibits ALDH2 to reduce the rewarding effects of substances, thereby helping to mitigate cravings and support recovery.
What conditions is ANS-858 targeted to treat?
ANS-858 is primarily focused on substance use disorders, including alcohol and cocaine dependencies, as well as potential benefits for binge eating and anxiety.
When are the clinical trials expected to begin?
The clinical trials for ANS-858 are anticipated to start following the submission of an IND application to the FDA.
What is the significance of Amygdala Neurosciences' work?
Amygdala Neurosciences aims to revolutionize treatment options for addiction and compulsive behaviors, addressing an urgent public health need with innovative therapies.
